mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Pot Luck Special", "Double Pass Thru", and "Pack Up your Troubles" ROUND DANCES "Easy Melody" and "Waltz Romance" SPECIAL FEATURES "Dance Programs Across the Country", "Dr. Shaw's Message for 1955", "Swap Shop at Fontana", "Meet the 1955 Convention Chairmen, Oklahoma", "The Square Dance Swing", "Square Dances Promenade in Ancient", and "A Square Dance Crossword". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "As I see it", "Square Dance Picture", "The Square of the Month", "Round the Outside Ring", "From the Floor" and "Calendar of Square Dancing Events".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
